name: Free Falling
description:
This is an experiment on physics-driven 2d controls. The final result, albeit ugly, is actually quite challenging and highly addictive.

  • wasd to move (w/s to slow down and speed up).
  • You gain more points the faster you go!
  • Don't hit the boxes ;)

Note: A prototype created for the OneHourGameJam, fully built in 1 hour.
